entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Mono] Give ILStrip a namespace #89608
    8.0.0
  • ComInterfaceGenerator should warn on PreserveSig methods that return a struct named HResult #89603
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Firefox test failure `DebuggerTests.MiscTests.InspectPropertiesOfObjectFromExternalLibrary` #89602
    8.0.0
  • JIT: fully enable Runtime_71375.cs test #89595
  • Debugger assert during register mapping #89592
  • string Equals and IndexOf with OrdinalIgnoreCase don't agree under InvariantGlobalization #89591
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add Merge-Method to JsonSerializerOptions #89590
  • System.Net.WebRequestPrefixElement..ctor throws a null exception #89589
    Future
  • JIT: Runtime_82535 crashes on osx x64 #89585
  • ComInterfaceGenerator has guaranteed unmarshal after the managed call in unmanaged to managed stubs #89582
  • [browser] Suport for OutputType Library #89577
    9.0.0
  • wasm format #89574
  • [browser] "Expected asset to have the downloaded buffer" assert fails when specifying "buffer" in MonoConfig #89570
  • [Android][Test] Failed to install mobile app #89567
  • [Android] Build failure: no previous prototype for function 'register_aot_modules' #89566
    8.0.0
  • JIT: LowerHWIntrinsicGetElement can reorder trees unsafely #89565
    9.0.0
  • arm32 Required Version trouble #89556
  • Unhandled exception while loading Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServices #89553
  • Regressions in Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.ScopeValidation #89579
  • HttpClient can't handle 307 or 308 status codes for large POST payloads #89549
  • Test failure Loader/classloader/generics/regressions/DD117522/Test/Test.sh #89545
  • [API Proposal]: Marshaller for OLE `VARIANT` #89543
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Events get ignored by COM in VBA (Excel) when invoked inside a Task #82628
    8.0.0
  • `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder` has an undocumented breaking change starting in `8.0.0-preview.5.23280.8` regarding enum dictionary keys #89547
    8.0.0
  • Allow Marshalling SafeHandle as other integer sizes. #71594
    Future
  • RuntimeEnvironment.GetSystemVersion returns wrong version #87908
    8.0.0
  • Improve the JsonSerializerOptions.MakeReadOnly() exception message. #87460
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fetching assemblies in the debug proxy is (possibly) slower now #70807
    8.0.0
  • Analyzer: Prefer Task.FromResult over Task.Run(() => value) #67123
    Future
  • ConfigurationManager.GetSection("system.diagnostics") throws ConfigurationErrorsException on net6.0 #88456
    8.0.0
  • The `FindPythonInterp` will be removed by cmake #89424
  • ServiceController's API got wrong service status #88105
    Future
  • Decoder ran into invalid data #87965
    Future
  • Frozen collection tests fail on NativeAOT #88628
    8.0.0
  • MemoryExtensions.IndexOfAnyExcept produces invalid results in AVX-512 enabled hardware #89512
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Local morph GetElement/WithElement handling for Vector3 does not handle larger SIMD sources #89456
    8.0.0
  • Vectorized code in loop performance problems due to excessive stack <-> vector register moves #85359
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/jit64/opt/cse/HugeField2/HugeField2.cmd #88028
    8.0.0
  • runtime build should use python3 instead of failing #75584
    8.0.0
  • [android] arm64 running on x64 emulator unexpected FPSIMD_MAGIC assert #62201
    8.0.0
  • EventSource_ParallelRequests_LogsNewConnectionIdForEachRequest timeout on OSX #89035
    8.0.0
  • UseNLS switch not working in Linux Docker Containers for Dot net Core 6 Application #89563
  • Missing Metadata exception with the Microsoft.Extensions.Options 5.0.0 Package #44697
    Future
  • Blazor Wasm TimeZoneInfo.Local.GetUtcOffset is returning 7:53:00 in PST zone #78721
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json deserialisation does not respect "required" keyword when used in base class #86031
    8.0.0
  • Mono EventPipe code in ep_rt_temp_path_get has an off by 1 issue #86640
    8.0.0
  • Maybe convert Parallel.ForEachAsync to ValueTask instead of Task #89552
  • Cannot read appsettings.json if you used Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Tools 8.0-preview #89284
    8.0.0
  • Ensure System.Text.Json SG diagnostics don't use locations from external assemblies #88424
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Apple mobile tests could not find test artifacts #89491
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Some of the System.Xml.Tests.TC_SchemaSet_XmlResolver tests get stuck on Browser when multi-threading is enabled #75183
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Proxy disconnected on refresh #76438
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][http] System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests should throw HttpRequestException #54160
    8.0.0
  • JIT: GDV does not handle delegates pointing to generic methods correctly #89495
    8.0.0
  • Stack buffer overrun stack cookie check leading to crash in .net6.0 application #89309
    9.0.0
  • Expand existing tests matrix to MonoVM #33381
    8.0.0
  • Unnecessary suppression errors showing up in build using .NET 8 Preview 7 SDK #89206
    8.0.0
  • ComActivator throws NotSupportedException when oleview tries to create instance #85715
    8.0.0
  • Quic Connect fails with weird error when connecting to IPv6 and AF not available #74053
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove _isBlocked constraint from StreamReader.Peek() #89609
    area-System.IO
  • [wasm] Disable failing debugger test on firefox #89607
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Top level statement tests #89606
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add MediaType to BinaryData #89605
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix arm64 line numbers in stacktraces #89604
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add Info warning for int return values #89601
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [browser] Read `AssetTraitValue` to get culture for resource during webcil transformation #89600
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [Perf] Cache key size in CngKey #89599
    area-System.Security, tenet-performance
  • Stop using computed RID for RUNTIME_IDENTIFIER property #89598
    area-Host
  • Add more doc comments that were missing #89597
    documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • Add [DebuggerGuidedStepThrough] to new invoker methods #89596
    area-System.Reflection, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Upgrade DNNE to build incrementally #89594
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [nodejs][http] enable active issue 86326 #89588
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Improve config binding gen parsing & make generation specs incremental #89587
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Fix EventLog test CanReadAndWriteMessages and elevate with RemoteExecutor #89586
    area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog
  • Guaranteed unmarshal before managed call in unmanaged to managed stubs #89583
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add more meaningful assert message to PerformanceCounter test that fails intermittently in Win11 arm64 #89581
    area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter
  • [mono] Fix more memory leaks in aot+interp mode. #89580
    needs-area-label
  • For perf, use the new ConstructorInvoker APIs for ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory #89573
    tenet-performance, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tests] Add prefix load environment variable for correct assembly path resolution #89572
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Specify callback calling convention for callbacks on Windows x86 causes crashes on Mono. #89571
    arch-x86, area-Interop-mono, area-Diagnostics-mono
  • [mono][android] Always include marshal-ilgen #89564
    os-android, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Enable TLS field access optimization #89561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] dispose more JS proxies #89559
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Fix second pass of MarshallingPInvokeScanner with metadata-free DLLs #89555
    area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add check that tests are public #89554
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove unnecessary "return 100"s from tests #89550
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Make casting logic closer to CoreCLR #89548
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • [wasm] WBT - add some debug bits to collect information on a rare failure #89584
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Avoid boxing in Enum.HasFlag in Tier0 #89348
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve serialization error message when IsReflectionEnabledByDefault is turned off. #89578
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Update `RuntimeEnvironment.GetSystemVersion()` #89575
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • Remove unused suppressions for System.Linq.Expressions #89524
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, source-build
  • [wasm][debugger]Trying to improve CI performance for debugger-tests #89525
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Make host tests use HostWriter to create apphost to test #89523
    area-Host
  • Only register System.Diagnostics section on net7 and later #89535
    area-System.Configuration
  • [release/7.0-staging] [Mono] Look for Native Signal SIMD Context #89568
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.11
  • Fix FrozenCollection tests failing in Native AOT #89569
    area-System.Collections, 8.0.0
  • Fixing the new V512 logic to properly negate the mask checks #89522
    area-System.Memory
  • Update description of DOTNET_JitStressProcedureSplitting #89576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Handle half accesses for SIMDs in local morph #89520
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Set some limits in gtSplitTree stress testing #89560
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove `AssemblyMetadata(".NETFrameworkAssembly", "")` attributes #89490
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix opt-cross-module using non version safe tokens #89481
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • use FindPython to also locate python3 #89546
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [Mono] Look for Native Signal SIMD Context #89467
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Try to improve EventSource_ParallelRequests_LogsNewConnectionIdForEachRequest reliability #89192
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [HttpClientFactory] Add tests for all simple SocketsHttpHandler properties #89202
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • Setting RequiredMemberAttribute usage as inherited. #89418
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Improve default cross compiler state #88917
    area-Build-mono
  • [Mono] Fix for EventPipe ep_rt_temp_path_get off by 1 issue. #89438
    area-Tracing-mono
  • Ensure System.Text.Json SG diagnostics don't use Location values from referenced assemblies. #89518
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tests] Use RecursiveDir property to create app bundle for Helix #89508
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Enable System.Xml.Tests.TC_SchemaSet_XmlResolver tests #89551
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono][llvm][jit] Adding support for Vector128::ExtractMostSignificantBits intrinsic on ARM64 with LLVM + refactoring miniJIT opcodes #89431
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [browser][http] test and compatibility improvements #89504
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Remove illink test workaround for removed declaring type #89529
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Set method context for delegate GDV #89499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Flush the gclog after GC #88222
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Ensure that `EqualsAny(x & y, Zero)` uses the right `GenCondition` #89544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • `IUnknown` is also valid for call to `DllGetClassObject` #89540
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Disable networking in XML resolver in AOT compilers #89489
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix new hits for analyzer CA2249 #89542
    area-Meta, code-fixer
  • Trim trailing space #89541
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix hits for new analyzer CA1862 #89539
    area-System.Security, code-fixer
  • [release/7.0-staging] Zlib: Update zlib to v1.2.13, intel-zlib to v1.2.13_jtk #89517
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.11
  • handle QUIC_STATUS_ADDRESS_NOT_AVAILABLE #89362
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Upgrade all VMs to AMD64 Ubuntu 22.04 #86194
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add some checks for merged test groups #89521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add back cmake command-line cache on unix #86764
    area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2230992 #89414
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Ownership tracking #89329
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 9.0.0
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Move the IsLeft/IsRight decision out of the loop and use computed substring set #88516
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [WASM][WIP] Add ILStrip task to wasm app build process #88926
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Implement IKeyedServiceProvider interface on ServiceProviderEngineScope #89509
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • NativeAOT createdump fork/exec for crash dump generation #89203
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • adding clrgc variant with regions enabled #89129
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add the interop tags to the "add to the AppModel project" automation #89221
    area-Meta
  • Use live illink for trimming tests #88929
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Gen0 Budget counter #89412
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add BinaryData.ContentType #87744
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • add SendTo/ReceiveFrom with SocketAddress #88970
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Corrected] - Enable Libraries R2R Testing in CI #89405
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] CI for running wbt with multithreaded runtime #87895
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm

    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Integrate DevServer into WasmAppHost #88985
    arch-wasm, area-Host, os-browser, 8.0.0

    area-CodeGen-coreclr

    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Flow TasksConfiguration in build & specify generator config #84931
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Fix encoding problem when publishing with AOT #89388
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, wasm-aot-test, 7.0.x
  • Remove net7 nuget feeds #89460
    area-Infrastructure, needs-area-label
  • [browser] Clean-up typescript code imported from Blazor #89435
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Fix ABI and Interop issues with InlineArray types #89519
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix ProfileEnter / ProfileLeave #88134
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Flow binder gen diag locations correctly & pick up more bind input patterns #89537
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Create docs transport package and turn on extensions source of truth #89312
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [browser] high level documentation of WASM features #89469
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Remove Crossgen2's -O option in Test Builds Wherever Possible #89223
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Bugfix/30024 problem with concurrency type descriptor getconverter #85156
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Hide IntrospectionExtensions.GetTypeInfo #89317
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [HttpClientFactory] Remove dependency on ILoggerFactory #89531
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • Tag events with thread specific information #89516
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Jiterpreter multithreading support #88279
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • SBLK_MASK_LOCK_THREADID allow tid up to 65535 (#88772) #89335
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Try to fix missing libc++.so.1 errors in arm64 llvmaot perf run #88705
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Do not build mono libs with `-msimd128` #89502
    area-Build-mono
  • [iOS][MacOS] Run tests on iOS 17 and MacOS 14 scouting queues #88479
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [ios][tests] Run functional tests with Mono and Native AOT on Helix #87773
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [mono][sgen] Log also size of reserved empty major blocks #88825
    area-GC-mono
  • [mono][tests] Enable ILStrip during AOT compilation of library tests #88167
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Enabled Ctor, Set_Item and Get_Item Vector4 intrinsics for miniJIT on ARM64 #89501
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • [nativeaot][ios] Improve Native AOT test coverage on apple mobile platforms #89301
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0

  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #89303
    area-HostModel, community-contribution

    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
